mapper.select: select r.name as roomName, r.roomNumber, r.price, r.maxPeople, r.petSizeLimit, r.petCountLimit, r.thumbnail, h.name as hotelName, rs.checkinDate, rs.checkoutDate, rs.guestCount, rs.petCount, rs.totalPrice from reservation rs join room r on rs.roomIdx = r.idx join hotel h on r.hotelIdx = h.idx where rs.mid = #{mid} and rs.status ='이용완료' order by rs.checkinDate desc;
